A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: After seeing this opening night\, I'm still not sure which is worse....The Last Jedi or November 8th\, 2016?   This movie is a far cry from Rogue One!  WAY too many cheesy comedy one-liners.  Star Wars movies should be epic classics that you want to watch over and over\, but when it's littered with bad comedy\, watching it a 2nd or 3rd time just becomes annoying.  I hope Episode 9 is better...
